mapper.select: select CONCEPT_NAME from FUrNITURE_ARRANGEMENT_PLAN P, FUrNITURE_ARR_PLAN_CONCEPT C, CONCEPT A where P.FUR_ARR_PLAN_NO = C.FUR_ARR_PLAN_NO AND C.CONCEPT_NO = A.CONCEPT_NO AND p.fur_arr_plan_no=#{fur_arr_plan_no}

select p.FUR_ARR_PLAN_NO,ai.FUR_ARR_PLAN_IMG_LOC,p.FUR_ARR_NAME,p.mem_id,r.ROOM_NAME,p.FUR_ARR_PLAN_GOOD_NUM,p.FUR_ARR_PLAN_REPL_NUM from furniture_arrangement_plan p, furniture_arr_room_kind rk, room_kind_define kd,furniture_arrangement_image ai,room r where p.fur_arr_plan_no=rk.FUR_ARR_PLAN_NO and rk.ROOM_KIND_DEF_NO=kd.ROOM_KIND_DEF_NO and p.FUR_ARR_PLAN_NO=ai.FUR_ARR_PLAN_NO and p.ROOM_NO=r.ROOM_NO and kd.room_kind_def_name=#{room_kind_def_name}

select count(*) from furniture_arrangement_plan p, furniture_arr_room_kind rk, room_kind_define kd,furniture_arrangement_image ai,room r where p.fur_arr_plan_no=rk.FUR_ARR_PLAN_NO and rk.ROOM_KIND_DEF_NO=kd.ROOM_KIND_DEF_NO and p.FUR_ARR_PLAN_NO=ai.FUR_ARR_PLAN_NO and p.ROOM_NO=r.ROOM_NO and kd.room_kind_def_name=#{room_kind_def_name}

select c.concept_name from furniture_arrangement_plan p, furniture_arr_room_kind rk, room_kind_define kd,furniture_arr_plan_concept pc,concept c where p.fur_arr_plan_no=rk.FUR_ARR_PLAN_NO and rk.ROOM_KIND_DEF_NO=kd.ROOM_KIND_DEF_NO and p.fur_arr_plan_no=pc.fur_arr_plan_no and pc.concept_no=c.concept_no and kd.room_kind_def_name=#{room_kind_def_name}
select count(*) from furniture_arr_plan_scrap where fur_arr_plan_no=#{fur_arr_plan_no}

select p.FUR_ARR_PLAN_NO,ai.FUR_ARR_PLAN_IMG_LOC,p.FUR_ARR_NAME,p.MEM_ID,c.CONCEPT_NAME,r.ROOM_NAME,p.FUR_ARR_PLAN_GOOD_NUM,p.FUR_ARR_PLAN_REPL_NUM from furniture_arrangement_plan p, furniture_arr_plan_concept pc,furniture_arrangement_image ai,concept c,room r where p.fur_arr_plan_no=pc.fur_arr_plan_no and p.fur_arr_plan_no=ai.fur_arr_plan_no and pc.concept_no=c.concept_no and p.room_no=r.room_no and c.concept_name=#{concept_name}

select fur_arr_plan_img_loc, fap.fur_arr_plan_no, fur_arr_name, m.mem_id, mem_nickname, mem_profile_pic, fur_arr_contents, fur_arr_create_date, fur_arr_plan_good_num, fur_arr_plan_repl_num, (select count(*) from furniture_arr_plan_scrap where fur_arr_plan_no = #{fur_arr_plan_no}) as fur_arr_plan_scrap_num, (select sum(fur_price) as total_fur_price from furniture where fur_no IN (select fur_no from arrangement_furniture where fur_arr_plan_no = #{fur_arr_plan_no}) ) as total_fur_price from furniture_arrangement_plan fap, furniture_arrangement_image fai, member m where fap.fur_arr_plan_no = fai.fur_arr_plan_no and fap.mem_id = m.mem_id and fap.fur_arr_plan_no = #{fur_arr_plan_no}
select fur_arr_hashtag_name from furniture_arr_plan_hashtag where fur_arr_plan_no = #{fur_arr_plan_no}
select fur_pic_loc from furniture_picture where fur_no = #{fur_no} and rownum = 1
select count(*) from furniture_arr_plan_scrap where fur_arr_plan_no=#{fur_arr_plan_no} and mem_id=#{mem_id}
mapper.insert: insert into furniture_arr_plan_scrap(fur_arr_plan_scrap_no, mem_id, fur_arr_plan_no, fur_arr_plan_scrap_date) values(seq_fur_arr_plan_scrap.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{fur_arr_plan_no}, sysdate)
